response.overview: As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador.
response.tagline: The movie was fake. The mission was real.
response.title: Argo
